Posts.EditableText:
Hi

I have been playing a LOT of games on here. So, I wondered, could it be possible for me to contact a person of a game they have built in order of that I can do a walkthrough or just plain record the game as it’s being played?
Posts.HTML:
Hi

Posts.EditableText:
Some games, like my Xan II, have a built-in walk-through/hint system.  Those games probably mention that in the game description.  

If that is what you’re asking.  ?

Posts.EditableText: You could try clicking on the authors name on the games page and write them a message.
